Name: Sherman Creek Center
Requirements: Drop off food scraps in the green metal containers within the large operations yard on the east side of the street. Do not include any metal, plastic, meat, oils, cooked foods, or highly invasive weeds. Contact jsmith@nyrp.org with any questions.
